grade: Jōyō kanji, taught in junior high
on reading compounds: 勧告【カンコク】advice, counsel, remonstrance, recommendation
kun reading compounds: 勧める【すすめる】to recommend (someone to do), to advise, to encourage, to urge, to recommend (a book, someone for a position, etc.), to suggest, to offer (a drink, cigarette, seat, etc.)
